data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tangkawanit, Ubon, Kuvangkadilok, Chaliow, Baimai, Visut, Adler, Peter H. (2009): Morphotaxonomy of the Simulium (Simulium) tuberosum species group (Diptera: Simuliidae) in Thailand. Zootaxa 2048: 31-46, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.186496
